name: eyetest
0:
”Alexa, show office camera.”
”Alexa, show the office camera.”
”Alexa, show feed from office”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Ebitcam is a kind of IP camera produced by our company and you can see feed of it remotely by our client App. And now, we have a great news to announce that our ebitcams are able to work with echo show and fire tv, which means you can use echo show or fire tv to display the feed of ebitcams...such an amazing thing.

To use this skill, you need
1. an ebitcam and setup it
2. use alexa app to discover the device

Then, you can say "show my garage" (suppose your ebitcam's nick name is garage) after you wake up echo show or fire tv.

Wanna know more about ebitcam, please visit our office website, https://www.ebitcam.com.
